attributes.title: disappointed in the app, still love my presidentğŸ˜
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to show support for the best president to ever lead america, but when i downloaded this app i was extremely disappointedğŸ˜­ i was active on it for the first few minutes of having the app, but then when i left to make my mayonnaise sandwich for six minutes, i got seventeen notifications from the app saying i was not supporting trump enoughğŸ˜© i was of course heartbroken because never in my wildest dreams would i have ever thought that i supported our breathtakingly handsomeğŸ¥´ president enough i had always proudly claimed that i was his biggest supporterğŸ¥° so of course i went back onto the app, hoping trumpie would think it was some sort of mistake. after spending three hours and twenty seven minutes on the app, i heard my iguana asking for some food, so i turned off my phone and went to the pantry to get his spaghetti ğŸ after my little baby was all fed, i went back to the phone to see more notifications saying that i wasnâ€™t supporting enough, and that i would have to be punished for my behaviorğŸ˜± i was very frightened by this, and after sixteen minutes, mike pence (who i had always thought was incredibly handsomeğŸ˜³) came busting through my doorğŸ˜ of course i welcomed his presence in my home at first, i even went to the kitchen to make him some cod and kalnji salad ğŸ¥—but while i was in the kitchen he took eight of my guns and said i would have one third of my guns taken away every time i did something like thisğŸ˜¤ now of course i knew i could not go on like this, so i changed my name, threw away my phone, took all the cash out of my accounts and bought a plane ticket to taiwan, where i will live as a hermit and nomad for the rest of my miserable lifeğŸ§š‍â™‚ï¸ i still support trump though (how could i not support someone with such magnificent hair!) and i hope he rules america for the rest of his life!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! i love you trump, but i donâ€™t like this app very muchğŸ˜¿ i really wish it worked outğŸ¥º
